verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Summer warm and hazy
lemon sun and lazy
remember
posicle red on my chin
bikes and plastic army men
no sign of September
something in my seven years was calling me
to love the Author of my own biography

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nonny nonny oli
river washes over me
up form there and carries me away
nonny nonnie oli
run the earth and watch the sky
praying hard and waiting for the day
nonny nonny oli

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
my adolesent seventies
reads just like the Pevensies
adventure
cause ever perfect now and then
i caught a glimpse of Aslan's mane
And i'd long for his treasure
something in his mystery was drawing me
to love author of my own biography

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Now I'm grown up and living fine
Biographies are intertwined
with billions
soon he turns the final page
we'll look the author in the face
and book really begins
Something tells me all these years of memories
are only the first sente
